virtual.bitcoin_bet: Hi! I'm anonymous and Blockchain-proved bet bot ü§ë. I accept bets on BTC rate and pay rewards to winners. Learn more on ADAMANT‚Äôs blog or type **/help** to start betting.
virtual.adelina:
Hello, I‚Äôm Adelina. Let's have a pleasure talk! I can do many things like:
- Draft an email or other piece of writing
- Write Python code
- Answer questions about a set of documents
- Support conversations
- Tutor in a range of subjects
- Translate languages
- Compose a poem
- Simulate characters for video games and much more
virtual.exchange_bot: Hi! I'm your exchange bot ‚Çø. I operate instantly and anonymously. Type **/help** to see what I can do. **‚Ñπ**Ô∏è Learn more on ADAMANT blog.
virtual.bounty_bot: Welcome! Earn ADM with your social activity! Send **/help** command for details.
virtual.donate_bot: We develop decentralized ADAMANT Messenger thanks to your support‚Äîtransfer ADM, BTC, ETH and other coins in this chat. For additional donation wallets, see https://adamant.im/donate.
virtual.welcome_message:
ADAMANT is a unique Blockchain messenger that is independent from government, corporations and even its developers. It is possible due to a decentralized network, fully open source and users' feedback. That's why every action, including messaging or saving new contacts, has a network fee of 0.001 ADM.

Unlike typical P2P and centralized messengers, the blockchain system offers superior security and privacy. What‚Äôs more, it provides users with new possibilities such as storing and transferring cryptocurrencies In-Chat with full control of private keys; use ADAMANT as a 2FA solution, exchange cryptocurrency anonymously and bet on Bitcoin rates and more.

The ADAMANT blockchain system belongs to its users. Nobody can control, block, deactivate, restrict or censor accounts. Users take full responsibility for their content, messages, media, and goals and intentions of using the messenger.

ADAMANT is anonymous, your IP is hidden even from partners, and Tor version is available for those that want to take privacy to the next level. But remember, your security and anonymity are up to you. Do not follow links you receive, otherwise your IP can be compromised. Set a password on your device. Learn more about security and anonymity at https://adamant.im/staysecured/.

Make sure you've saved your unique passphrase for this account ‚Äî logout and login again. Write your passphrase on a sheet of paper as well. Only *you are responsible for the passphrase's safety*. It cannot be recovered. And if other person gets it, your tokens will be stolen and your correspondence will be compromised. Treat this matter with outmost importance, as if tokens in your wallet cost a billion dollars.

To Start messaging now, *get your free welcoming tokens* on Account tab. Then start a new chat and fill in your friend's ADM address. It is recommended to share your ADM address personally and via ADAMANT only.

Search Internet for ADAMANT bots' addresses. They can exchange cryptocurrencies, accept bets on crypto rates, and make wishes come true.

nodes_offline_dialog.title: No active {coin} nodes
nodes_offline_dialog.text: Unable to request new messages ‚Äî No active {coin} blockchain nodes. As you've deactivated some of them, consider reviewing the node list.

chats.unsupported_transaction_type: This transaction type is not supported. Please refresh the page or install the latest version of the app.

errors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Check the console for details
errors.all_nodes_offline: No online {crypto} nodes. Review the node list
errors.all_nodes_disabled: No active {crypto} nodes. Enable at least one

warning_on_addresses.headline: Your account may be compromised
warning_on_addresses.about: You can accept in-chat crypto transfers, because of ADAMANT saves wallet addresses in Blockchain. To save them, passphrase is necessary‚Äîit means nobody can push wrong addresses on behalf of you.
warning_on_addresses.specifics_wrong_addresses: We've identified inconsistencies in stored addresses for your account. The {crypto} address saved as {storedAddress}, but correct one is {correctAddress}. It means if someone will send you {crypto} in-chat, you'll never receive it.
warning_on_addresses.specifics_many_addresses: We've identified more than one address, stored for {crypto} in your account: {manyAddresses}. It means somebody has stored fraud addresses.
warning_on_addresses.full_list_wrong_addresses: Full list of crypto with mismatched addresses: {crypto_list}.
warning_on_addresses.reasons: Maybe scammers control your account. Probably you've used account's passphrase in a fishing app, which may look like authentic, or hackers stole your passphrase.
warning_on_addresses.what_to_do: We recommend you to transfer all crypto from this account to a new one. Make sure your device is secure, and use only official apps. Be careful: only you are responsible for safety of your account.
warning_on_addresses.forget_button: Don't show again on this device
